roleset.name: no longer in (state/location); away from

role.descr: entity that is no longer in (state/location)

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5.

example.name: arg2 state: out of touch
example.text: He 's too old and too out of touch to get any support for anyone under 30 .
example.arg: [too] [to get any support for anyone under 30]

example.name: out of bounds
example.text: Honestly, I didn't know the ball was out of bounds until it was way up in the stands somewhere.

example.name: out of service
example.text: The ticket machine at Gaithersburg is out of service.

roleset.name: extinguished (fire, lights, power, etc)
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet.

example.name: arg1
example.text: If you noticed your drive is a little darker on downtown Atlanta interstates at night, that's because nearly half of the street lights are out.
example.arg: nearly half of the street lights

roleset.name: eliminated from play
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet.

example.name: both args
example.text: Kethi Kilonzo is out of the race for the senate seat in the fourth-coming by elections in Makueni county.
example.arg: of the race for the senate seat in the fourth-coming by elections in Makueni county

roleset.name: asleep, unconscious
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet.

example.name: unconscious
example.text: Abruptly my vision darkened as I felt the hilt of a sword hit me in the back of the head, and I was out like a light.

role.descr: entity who doesn't have any left
what there isn't any left of

example.name: both args
example.text: I mean, the guy started the whole thing because he was craving a PBJ, and was out of peanut butter.
